subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit considered problematic
msgSnippet: ... Okay, this discussion must be a hoax. So much deliberate ignorance cannot be real. Thanx for the profound discussion... Johannes -- +++ GMX - Mail,
messageBody:
> > No, that's not what happens when using DBC.

Okay, this discussion must be a hoax. So much deliberate ignorance cannot be
real.

Thanx for the "profound" discussion...

Johannes
